content.html: I'm told by a Home Office source that civil servants got no parting message from Priti Patel, not even a brief thanks for their work. Apparently this is v unusual for a parting home sec Quite telling of Patel's relationship with and treatment of her staff while she was in office
content.value:
I'm told by a Home Office source that civil servants got no parting message from Priti Patel, not even a brief thanks for their work. Apparently this is v unusual for a parting home sec

Quite telling of Patel's relationship with and treatment of her staff while she was in office
